title: Noisy boys ahead
description:
In this year's PremPredict, there are twenty teams, twenty-one players and a massive Â£105 up for grabs. Unfortunately, though, the noisy boys are currently on top: Yes, the old man, the brother and the best man. Please make it change!
In this post, I'll also show our collective expectations for the season.

title: Is it all over?
description: I run 10,000 simulations on the final round of matches in the Premier League season, so as to project the odds of each player winning my PremPredict competition.

title: My R code snippets
description: I keep a list of frequently-used code snippets that I find valuable and, in the spirit of the R community, I thought it best to share them.

title: Holiday ideas
description:
Yes, it is a first world problem, but we always struggle with holiday destinations. I prefer flying upside down to somewhere different, whilst my wife and boy aren't keen on heat or long flights. 
For that reason, I made this app to find somewhere that suits us all.
